  16. (* Consistency tables: for checking consistency of module CRCs *)

  18. open Misc

  20. module Make (Module_name : sig
  21.   type t
  22.   module Set : Set.S with type elt = t
  23.   module Map : Map.S with type key = t
  24.   module Tbl : Hashtbl.S with type key = t
  25.   val compare : t -> t -> int
  26. end) = struct
  27. ‌  type t = (Digest.t * filepath) Module_name.Tbl.t

  29. ‌  let create () = Module_name.Tbl.create 13

  31. ‌  let clear = Module_name.Tbl.clear

  33.   exception Inconsistency of {
  34.     unit_name : Module_name.t;
  35.     inconsistent_source : string;
  36.     original_source : string;
  37.   }

  39.   exception Not_available of Module_name.t

  41. ‌  let check_ tbl name crc source =
  42.     let (old_crc, old_source) = Module_name.Tbl.find tbl name in
  43.     if crc <> old_crc then raise(Inconsistency {
  44.         unit_name = name;
  45.         inconsistent_source = source;
  46.         original_source = old_source;
  47.       })

  49.   let check tbl name crc source =
  50.     try check_ tbl name crc source
  51.     with Not_found ->
  52.       Module_name.Tbl.add tbl name (crc, source)

  54.   let check_noadd tbl name crc source =
  55.     try check_ tbl name crc source
  56.     with Not_found ->
  57.       raise (Not_available name)

  59.   let source tbl name = snd (Module_name.Tbl.find tbl name)

  61.   let extract l tbl =
  62.     let l = List.sort_uniq Module_name.compare l in
  63.     List.fold_left
  64.       (fun assc name ->
  65.          try
  66.            let (crc, _) = Module_name.Tbl.find tbl name in
  67.              (name, Some crc) :: assc
  68.          with Not_found ->
  69.            (name, None) :: assc)
  70.       [] l

  72.   let extract_map mod_names tbl =
  73.     Module_name.Set.fold
  74.       (fun name result ->
  75.          try
  76.            let (crc, _) = Module_name.Tbl.find tbl name in
  77.            Module_name.Map.add name (Some crc) result
  78.          with Not_found ->
  79.            Module_name.Map.add name None result)
  80.       mod_names
  81.       Module_name.Map.empty

  83.   let filter p tbl =
  84.     let to_remove = ref [] in
  85.     Module_name.Tbl.iter
  86.       (fun name _ ->
  87.         if not (p name) then to_remove := name :: !to_remove)
  88.       tbl;
  89.     List.iter
  90.       (fun name ->
  91.          while Module_name.Tbl.mem tbl name do
  92.            Module_name.Tbl.remove tbl name
  93.          done)
  94.       !to_remove
  95. end
